intro: Is one of the following is true for you or your business?:
codeRescueSigns: Your developer disappeared, and you're locked out of your own code.
Progress has stalled, and the product can't move forward.
Deadlines are slipping because of unresolved technical issues.
The codebase is buggy, unstable, or impossible to maintain.
You've been quoted an outrageous amount just to get things working again.

placeholders.name: Full Name
placeholders.challenge: What's your AI challenge? Tell us about the problem you're trying to solve.

messages.success: Thank you! We'll be in touch soon.
messages.error: Failed to submit form. Please try again.
